poem:
### Underwater Discoveries

A ship's whisper,
buried in the dark blue,
calls out to hands that sift
through silt and time,
lifting gold, a sunken gleam,
teaching us
that even in wreckage,
stories surface,
brushing against our days,
changing the light
on everything we know.
